Create and publish a basic personal [web page using R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/rmarkdown_websites.html) and [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/).

* Site YAML---controls the web site structure

* INDEX page---the main page for your web site  

* ABOUT page---a brief blurb about yourself or your web site

* One OTHER page---for example, showcase your own research or a list of links

* Use one `theme` and one `highlight` style discussed [HERE](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/html_document_format.html) to customize the look of your page
